name: Looper! Neon balls puzzle
description:
Tap the screen and launch magic balls!
Be careful! Balls shouldn't collide, or you'll have to start all over again!
You will face more complex levels and get a lot of fun.
Download and start your journey now!

Features:
- Interesting and complex puzzles, more levels are coming soon!
- Many ways to solve each puzzle. Just get the timing right!
- Different balls with colored animation!
- Special abilities, for example "Slo-mo" that slows the balls speed
